    CustomComponent<CustomMenuBarUI>, ImageObserver, MenuContainer, Serializable, Accessible, MenuElement

    EnigmaMenuBar
    public class CustomMenuBar
extends JMenuBar
implements CustomComponent<CustomMenuBarUI>
    Une barre de menus customizable

    Version:
    4.1 27/12/2019
